author: James Tanner
method: Heat the oil in a wok or large frying pan, add the chilli, garlic and ginger and stir fry for one minute. Add the pak choi and stir fry for 1-2 minutes, or until beginning to wilt. Add the soy sauce, sesame oil and lime juice and simmer for 1-2 minutes. Add the cooked noodles and stir well. To serve, place the salad into a serving bowl and garnish with lime wedges.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  1 red chilli, chopped,  1 garlic clove, chopped,  2.5cm/1in piece root ginger, peeled and grated,  3 small bulbs pak choi, leaves separated,  2 tbsp soy sauce,  2 tsp sesame oil,  ½ lime, juice only,  150g/5½oz dried egg noodles, cooked according to packet instructions ,  lime wedges, to garnish
